name: Selepe Sello
description:
Driven by a passion for solving real-world challenges, I specialize in AWS Cloud Development, DevOps Engineering, Web Development, Database Management, and Software Testing. My curiosity for Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking fuels my ability to create secure, scalable solutions tailored to the ever-evolving demands of the software industry. Constantly exploring cutting-edge tools and practices, I thrive in dynamic environments that push innovation.

Equipped with a growing interest in Data Science, I enjoy uncovering actionable insights from data to guide strategic decisions. Outside the realm of technology, my love for chess and art sharpens my creativity and strategic thinking, which I bring into every project and collaboration.

As a STARS Mentor at the University of Pretoria, I have the privilege of empowering aspiring professionals to achieve their goals. Inspired by Martin Luther King, Jr.'s timeless question, 'What are you doing for others?' I find fulfillment in contributing to others' success, fostering a culture of growth, and building meaningful connections.

education.details: Relevant Coursework: Object-Oriented Programming, Databases, Discrete Mathematics, Operating Systems, Computer Networks, Machine Learning, Compiler Construction, Software Engineering, Concurrent Systems, Assembly, Multimedia, Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Programming Languages.

Participated in an intensive Web Development Bootcamp, enhancing skills in building robust websites and web applications. Strengthened capabilities in coding, unit testing, and various web technologies while advancing effective learning methodologies.

Completed the ALX-T Cloud Development Nanodegree Program, focusing on developing, deploying, and testing applications in the cloud using AWS (Amazon Web Services). Gained proficiency in leveraging various AWS services for application development.

experience.details: Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using modern technologies such as Next.js and Supabase, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability. Enhanced cloud infrastructure and hosting reliability, achieving 99.9% uptime through efficient DevOps practices and optimized resource allocation.

Built an interactive e-commerce platform, integrating custom WordPress plugins and optimizing user interfaces to increase customer engagement by 30%. Developed robust back-end solutions in PHP to handle complex product filtering and search capabilities.

Supported over 500 students and 5 administrators by ensuring the smooth operation of computer labs and related systems. Implemented efficient hardware and software installation processes, reducing downtime by 20%.
